mapper.select: select t.storageid "storageid", t.storagecode "storagecode", t.storagename "storagename", t.storagealias "storagealias", t.privinceid "privinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storagetypeid "storagetypeid", t.storagestructureid "storagestructureid", t.length "length", t.width "width", t.height "height", t.capacitydesigned "capacitydesigned", t.actualcapacity "actualcapacity", t.storageemp "storageemp", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude", t.openingdate "openingdate", t.storagestatus "storagestatus", t.orderno "orderno", t.sectioncount "sectioncount", t.layercount "layercount", t.colcount "colcount", t.diameter "diameter", t.insulation "insulation", t.ventilateid "ventilateid", t.fumigateid "fumigateid", t.wincount "wincount", t.doorcount "doorcount", t.constructyear "constructyear", t.wheatdensity "wheatdensity", t.wheatcapacity "wheatcapacity", t.ricedensity "ricedensity", t.ricecapacity "ricecapacity", t.corndensity "corndensity", t.corncapacity "corncapacity", t.soydensity "soydensity", t.soycapacity "soycapacity", t.ghlineheight "ghlineheight", t.storetec "storetec", t.defgrainid "defgrainid", t.defgrainattrid "defgrainattrid", t.defproducingyear "defproducingyear", t.videoid1 "videoid1", t.videoid2 "videoid2", t.videoid3 "videoid3", t.effectcapacity "effectcapacity", t.eavesheight "eavesheight", t.storagearea "storagearea", t.doorlength "doorlength", t.doorwidth "doorwidth", t.doorheight "doorheight", t.ductlength "ductlength", t.ductwidth "ductwidth", t.ductheight "ductheight", t.ductcount "ductcount", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.divwidth "divwidth", t.divheight "divheight", t.divtype "divtype", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_storage t where storageid=#{storageid}

select t.storageid "storageid", t.storagecode "storagecode", t.storagename "storagename", t.storagealias "storagealias", t.privinceid "privinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "ductwidth", t.ductheight "ductheight", t.ductcount "ductcount", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.divwidth "divwidth", t.divheight "divheight", t.divtype "divtype", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_storage t where 1=1 and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.storagecode=#{storagecode} and t.storagename=#{storagename} and t.storagealias=#{storagealias} and t.privinceid=#{privinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid} and t.storagestructureid=#{storagestructureid} and t.length=#{length} and t.width=#{width} and t.height=#{height} and t.capacitydesigned=#{capacitydesigned} and t.actualcapacity=#{actualcapacity} and t.storageemp=#{storageemp} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.openingdate=#{openingdate} and t.storagestatus=#{storagestatus} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.sectioncount=#{sectioncount} and t.layercount=#{layercount} and t.colcount=#{colcount} and t.diameter=#{diameter} and t.insulation=#{insulation} and t.wheatcapacity=#{wheatcapacity} and t.ricedensity=#{ricedensity} and t.ricecapacity=#{ricecapacity} and t.corndensity=#{corndensity} and t.corncapacity=#{corncapacity} and t.soydensity=#{soydensity} and t.soycapacity=#{soycapacity} and t.ghlineheight=#{ghlineheight} and t.storetec=#{storetec} and t.defgrainid=#{defgrainid} and t.defgrainattrid=#{defgrainattrid} and t.defproducingyear=#{defproducingyear} and t.videoid1=#{videoid1} and t.videoid2=#{videoid2} and t.videoid3=#{videoid3} and t.effectcapacity=#{effectcapacity} and t.eavesheight=#{eavesheight} and t.storagearea=#{storagearea} and t.doorlength=#{doorlength} and t.doorwidth=#{doorwidth} and t.doorheight=#{doorheight} and t.ductlength=#{ductlength} and t.ductwidth=#{ductwidth} and t.ductheight=#{ductheight} and t.ductcount=#{ductcount} and t.position_x=#{position_x} and t.position_y=#{position_y} and t.divwidth=#{divwidth} and t.divheight=#{divheight} and t.divtype=#{divtype} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
mapper.update: update l_storage set storageid=storageid ,position_x=#{position_x} ,position_y=#{position_y} ,divwidth=#{divwidth} ,divheight=#{divheight} ,divtype=#{divtype} where storageid=#{storageid}
mapper.select: select * from l_video where 1=1 and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.update: update l_video set videoid=videoid ,position_x=#{position_x} ,position_y=#{position_y} where videoid=#{videoid}
